translation.en: -[typing] -[Justine] It occurred to her that nothing she'd accepted as a reality was real.
translation.ko: '불현듯 자신이 받아들인 현실이 다 가짜란 사실을 깨달았다'

translation.en: Nothing.
Maybe there was no house, no husband, no child, no work.
translation.ko: '집도, 남편도, 아이도, 일도 다 가짜였는지도 모른다'

translation.en: None of it.
Just a giant hole in her heart.
Ah, no. No, no, no.
Giant hole in her chest.
Nah.
Giant hole in her eye.
A giant hole in her stomach.
A giant hole in her… butt.
A giant butthole.
I'm sorry. You're 55 cents short.
It's my friend's birthday. I'm just, you know…
Take these. $9.99.
Really?
They look exactly the same. Why are they so much cheaper?
translation.ko: 똑같아 보이는데 - 왜 이렇게 싸요? - 향이 없거든요

translation.en: Odorless.
Sorry, Mom.
-Anyways… -[phone dings] …once she saw her hole, she knew she had to cover it
translation.ko: '아무튼 구멍을 본 그녀는 그걸 가려야만 했다'

translation.en: to make it seem like she didn't know
because she was scared that if the hole got too big,
translation.ko: '구멍이 점점 커져서 텅 빈 곳에 빠져버릴까 봐'

translation.en: she'd fall into the nothing.
translation.ko: '겁이 났기 때문이다' "냉장고에 케이크 넣어 뒀어 친구들과 좋은 시간 보내!"

translation.en: Into the giant…
butthole.
Shit.
[in French] Martin, I'm going to the birthday.
I have a complete block today anyway.
I don't know what's happening to me, I can't do it.
[in French] Justine, you're not Simone de Beauvoir. You do cooking.
translation.ko: 당신은 시몬 보부아르가 아니라 요리하는 사람이잖아

translation.en: Do your recipes and everything will be fine.
I don't just cook, I'm a chef, you know, but…
translation.ko: 그냥 요리하는 게 아니라 셰프지 그건 그렇고

translation.en: They're asking me to do the impossible, a kind of diary with recipes. I…
translation.ko: 내게 너무 많은 걸 요구했어 레시피 에세이라니

translation.en: How do you like my dress?
The color?
I don't know, put your coat on. You can take it off when you're seated.
translation.ko: 코트 입고 가서 자리에 앉은 다음에 벗어

translation.en: Oh, yeah, yeah, good idea. I was going to put it on anyway.
translation.ko: 그래, 좋은 생각이네 안 그래도 입고 가려고 했어

translation.en: Well, everything's ready for you for dinner tonight, so…
By the way, your zombie cat defecated in the bathtub again.
translation.ko: 당신 좀비 고양이가 욕조에 또 똥 쌌더라

translation.en: You know, Justine, I can't take it anymore, he's getting too old.
translation.ko: 쥐스틴, 더는 못 참겠어 이제 걔 나이도 많잖아

translation.en: We're going to have to make a decision. I'll clean it up, don't worry.
translation.ko: - 결단을 할 때가 됐어 - 내가 치울게, 신경 쓰지 마

translation.en: We're out of Greek yogurt. The fridge has been empty since yesterday.
translation.ko: 그릭 요거트 다 떨어졌더라 어제부터 냉장고가 텅 비었어

translation.en: Oh, I completely forgot to buy some.
translation.ko: 완전히 깜빡했네 오는 길에 사 올게

translation.en: -I'll buy some on my way back. -Thanks, baby.
translation.ko: 완전히 깜빡했네 오는 길에 사 올게 고마워

translation.en: [in English] You have one kidney, brain cancer.
Now it's in your spine. I mean, how do you keep on living?
translation.ko: 그게 척추까지 전이됐는데 어떻게 살아있는 거야?

translation.en: What is wrong with you?
-[cat meows] -I love you, too.
[women] ♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
♪ Happy birthday, dear Yasmin ♪
♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
-Make a wish. Come on. -Make a wish.
Here, give me that part.
Can I just say now that I'm turning 39…
Yeah, right.
-…give or take a few years. -A few years.
Seriously, I just wanna say I am so grateful for every one of you.
translation.ko: 진심으로 말하는데 너희 한 명, 한 명이 정말 고마워

translation.en: God knows you can't choose your family, but at least you can choose your friends.
translation.ko: 가족은 고를 수 없지만 친구는 그렇지 않잖아

translation.en: And we've been through so much.
But I know no matter what happens, we've always had each other's backs,
translation.ko: 앞으로 무슨 일이 생겨도 지금껏 서로 곁에 있어 줬듯이 계속 그러리라 믿어

translation.en: and we always will.
translation.ko: 지금껏 서로 곁에 있어 줬듯이 계속 그러리라 믿어

translation.en: -To Yasmin. -To Yasmin.
Here's to the second half of your life.
May it be as glorious as the first.
-Isn't it more just one-third left? -Oh, my God.
-Oh, my God. -Unless she lives to be 100. Right?
First of all, if I live to be 90, which is entirely possible nowadays,
translation.ko: 첫째, 요즘 드문 일도 아니니까 내가 90살까지 살면

translation.en: it's, you know, mid-40's more like half-- glass half full.
Girls, did anybody notice Yasmin's beautiful dress?
translation.ko: - 좋네, 반은 차 있지 - 아무도 눈치 못 챘어? 야스민이 예쁜 원피스 입은 거?

translation.en: Oh.
Yes. An exclusive Annetta Porte.
The Yasmin, the first piece of my woman's collection.
translation.ko: 내 여성복 컬렉션 첫 작품 '더 야스민'이야

translation.en: It's stunning. You know I love your clothes.
Thank you.
So this super fucked-up thing happened with Jerry and I last night.
Can we please not do super fucked up on my birthday?
translation.ko: 내 생일인데 그런 얘기 안 하면 안 돼?

translation.en: I'm sorry, Yasmin. I shouldn't have said anything.
This is so good.
I mean, I work with Jerry. I need to know what happened.
translation.ko: 나 제리랑 같이 일하잖아 무슨 일인지 알아야 해

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -What happened?
Okay, fine. You know what? I'm slightly intrigued now anyway.
translation.ko: - 무슨 일인데? - 알았어, 해 솔직히 나도 좀 궁금하거든

translation.en: -Go ahead. -It's nothing big. Really. It's stupid.
translation.ko: - 별일 아니야 - 뭔데? 진짜 별거 아니야 어제 제리랑 저녁 먹었거든

translation.en: It's just, uh, Jerry and I had dinner last night,
translation.ko: 진짜 별거 아니야 어제 제리랑 저녁 먹었거든

translation.en: and I hadn't seen him in months, and then he drove me home, back to my apartment.
translation.ko: 몇 개월 만에 만난 건데 날 집까지 데려다줬어

translation.en: -That's the fucked-up story? -Yeah. It's nothing.
-That's it? -Yeah.
Okay. [laughs]
-What happened? -Well…
I don't understand how I ended up with three children,
translation.ko: 어쩌다 애 셋 엄마가 됐는지 모르겠어

translation.en: with three different dads,
and two of them don't have a pot to piss in.
-Right. -And it's just--
I don't even think Jason's ever paid taxes in his whole life, Jerry.
translation.ko: 제이슨은 평생 세금도 한 번 안 냈을 거야

translation.en: Well, you were crazy about him, you know. You had to have him.
I know, but did I have to procreate with him,
translation.ko: 그건 알지만 애까지 낳을 필요는 없었단 거지

translation.en: like a hen on steroids?
'Cause that's what I've been doing my whole life. My whole life.
-It's either been about a man… -Yeah.
…or trying to get a man or trying to get away from the man.
And that's usually the guy that I was trying to get with,
translation.ko: 6개월 전에는 못 만나서 안달이었던 남자를 말야

translation.en: like, six months before, and I just--
translation.ko: 6개월 전에는 못 만나서 안달이었던 남자를 말야 그간 시간을 너무 낭비했어, 제리

translation.en: I wasted so much time, Jerry.
I wasted so much time, and I want that time back, Jerry.
I want it back. I mean,
I could've learned Mandarin or something.
[laughs] No, I hear you, you know. I…
It's just like-- Remember when L.A. Weekly raved
about that little expresso bar I decorated on Highland?
Well, yeah. I mean, but, you know, you're not really-- you're not really doing the interior design thing anymore.
translation.ko: 그럼, 그런데 너 이제는 인테리어 디자인 안 하잖아

translation.en: You're focusing on social work, on giving back, right?
-No. -Yeah.
I'm focusing on social work because nobody wants to hire me, Jerry.
translation.ko: 아무도 고용 안 해주니까 사회사업만 하는 거야

translation.en: Ell, I really wanted to give you that job, but the investors insisted on hiring their own people.
translation.ko: 너한테 일자리 주고 싶은데 투자자들이 자기 사람들을 쓰래

translation.en: I know. It's just that I'm freaking out, Jerry.
My bank account looks like a fucking piggy bank, okay?
translation.ko: 알아, 그냥 너무 걱정돼서 그래 은행 계좌 잔고가 돼지 저금통 수준이란 말이야

translation.en: I'm just--I'm freaking out.
Do I look like a raccoon?
Yeah, kind of.
Ell, you know, I get it. I get it. I get it.
Here, let me--let me get-- Let me--
Oh, Ell, wait. -[pants unzip] -No, no, no. [grunts]
Ell. Ell.
Okay. Okay.
-I'm sorry. -No, it's great.
I just--I don't know what came over me. -It's okay. -[pants zip]
-It's good. -I'm gonna go now.
No, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait.
Here. Here. You know, take it.
translation.ko: 여기, 이거 - 가지고 가, 그거… - 알았어

translation.en: Take it for, you know, the…
Thank you.
Sorry.
Okay. Okay.
-Bye. -Bye.
Here, I'll get it. I'll get it.
Right here. Okay.
He paid you for a blow job with a check?
translation.ko: "제리 파솔리니 수신인: 엘 호로비츠" 입으로 한 후에 수표를 받았어?

translation.en: -Eh… -Oh, my God, Ell. I didn't know you were that poor.
Yeah, I'm really that poor.
-What? -This is so wrong.
translation.ko: - 나 진짜 가난해 - 뭐? 이건 아니잖아

translation.en: If old friends are turning their friends into hookers,
translation.ko: 오랜 친구 사이인데 상대를 매춘부로 만들다니

translation.en: I mean, we're doomed, right?
Say, maybe, you know, he paid you with a check.
It's sort of old-fashioned. It's kind of romantic.
-Romantic? -It's not.
It's insane. It's sex for money.
This is completely illegal in this country. Is it not?
Can we just table this for a second?
translation.ko: 이 얘기는 좀 이따 하면 안 돼?

translation.en: Just saying. Just for a second. Just for a second.
translation.ko: 이 얘기는 좀 이따 하면 안 돼? - 좋아 - 조금만 있다가

translation.en: -Happy birthday. -Okay.
translation.ko: - 좋아 - 조금만 있다가 - 생일 축하해 - 고마워

translation.en: -Thank you. -Happy birthday.
translation.ko: - 생일 축하해 - 고마워 - 생일 축하해 - 이게 다 몇 개지?

translation.en: How many of these have you-- Oh, do you want me to take that?
translation.ko: - 생일 축하해 - 이게 다 몇 개지? - 가져가도 돼? - 말도 안 돼

translation.en: This is insane.
Ell, I'll lend you money.
translation.ko: - 엘, 내가 돈 빌려줄게 - 안 그래도 돼

translation.en: -You don't have to do that. -Seriously.
translation.ko: - 엘, 내가 돈 빌려줄게 - 안 그래도 돼 줄게

translation.en: -What about Rebecca? -She left him. It's done.
-Again? -Yeah.
He hasn't told anyone, so don't…
No. Okay. Okay. But how could you do this to him?
translation.ko: 말 안 할게 그런데 넌 대체 왜 그랬어?

translation.en: You know he has an addiction, right? Sex. Love.
translation.ko: - 제리가 중독인 거 알지? - 난… 섹스랑 연애 중독 근데 왜 그랬어?

translation.en: -I know. -Why would you do that to him?
translation.ko: 섹스랑 연애 중독 근데 왜 그랬어?

translation.en: I know. I'm not proud-- Look, I was really depressed, okay?
translation.ko: 알아, 나도 그냥 그날 너무 우울했어

translation.en: And he was so heartbroken, and then one thing led to the next.
translation.ko: 제리도 너무 상심해 있었고 어쩌다 보니 그게…

translation.en: -Yes. Because he was depressed? -Yeah. You blew him to make him feel better?
translation.ko: 제리가 너무 속상해해서 기분 풀어주려고 그걸 했다고?

translation.en: Did he go down on you to make you feel better? Oh, God, no. Gross.
translation.ko: - 제리가 너도 해 줬어? - 아니! 징그러워

translation.en: And that's not gross?
I mean, come on, that's-- What am I gonna do?
translation.ko: 네가 한 건 괜찮고? 진짜… - 나 미쳤나 봐 - 난 이제 어쩌라고

translation.en: I work with him.
Just one thing. It's a blank check.
How much, in your opinion, do you think is the proper amount?
translation.ko: 얼마 정도를 쓰는 게 적당할 것 같아?

translation.en: Shut the fuck up! You're being annoying. You're supposed to be doing your homework!
translation.ko: 짜증 나게 좀 하지 마 숙제는 왜 안 해?

translation.en: I know you have a list of assignments!
Shut the fuck up, Kai! Oh, my God! Go back to your dad!
Do not say that to Kai! That is--Oh, wow. Wow.
translation.ko: 이러다 나 지겠어 카이한테 그렇게 말하지 마

translation.en: That hurt so much. You're so strong. Wow.
translation.ko: 아파 죽겠네, 너 힘 진짜 세다

translation.en: So you keep the steamed vegetables with the roast
and then you add the mustard and the gros sel.
-Okay. -All right?
-I'll place an order for the Guerande. -Yes.
Hey, Martin, how are you?
Well, no, I didn't pick him up, you know, Fridays can be a little…
translation.ko: 아니, 안 데려왔어 알다시피 금요일은 좀…

translation.en: It's very…
No, no, I'll go get him, I'll go get him. No, no, I'll bring him to the restaurant, then.
translation.ko: 아냐, 내가 데리러 갈게 가게로 데려오면 되지

translation.en: You can come get him after dinner.
I'll feed him. Okay.
Yeah, yeah, no, no. Thanks. Well, not really.
You started back on Bill Clinton's campaign.
My God. You must have been just a kid.
Literally. I was 18.
-[laughs] -Politics has always been my calling.
My mom's practically a Black Panther.
My father's Iranian, Muslim. I have Latinx relatives.
translation.ko: 아빠는 이란인에 무슬림이죠 라틴계 친척들도 있고요

translation.en: Basically, if you've been banned or persecuted in this country,
-you're probably related to me. -Oh, God.
translation.ko: - 다 저랑 연관이 있을 거예요 - 맙소사

translation.en: -Actually, yesterday was my birthday. -No way.
translation.ko: 사실 어제가 제 생일이었어요 - 세상에, 어제가 생일이었다고요? - 네

translation.en: -Yesterday was your birthday? -Yeah.
-It was my birthday, too. -What?
-That is so weird. -Oh, my goodness.
It's you, me, Joan of Arc.
translation.ko: - 진짜 신기하네요 - 웬일이야 - 야스민 씨, 저, 잔 다르크 - 맞아요

translation.en: -Right. -Different years, of course.
translation.ko: - 야스민 씨, 저, 잔 다르크 - 맞아요 - 물론 연도는 다르지만 - 그렇죠

translation.en: Well, happy birthday.
-Happy birthday to you. -Thanks.
Actually, birthdays, they're always a time of real self-reflection, right?
translation.ko: 사실 생일 근처가 되면 자신을 돌아보게 되잖아요?

translation.en: And I realized I have to get more involved, especially now.
translation.ko: 그랬더니 이제 좀 더 사회로 나와야겠다 싶더라고요

translation.en: That's why I'm so excited about this position.
Well, Yasmin, the truth is, if anything, you're overqualified for this job.
translation.ko: 야스민, 솔직히 이 일을 맡기기엔 너무 실력이 출중하세요

translation.en: [laughs] I mean, it's fundraising.
No. Not at all.
First of all, the part-time thing is perfect for my schedule.
translation.ko: 우선 시간제 일자리라 제 상황에 딱 맞아요

translation.en: And I took a few years off to focus on my son.
translation.ko: 아들을 키우느라고 몇 년간 일을 쉬었는데

translation.en: And, you know, he's in sixth grade now,
but I am so ready to jump back in.
Yasmin, can I be honest?
I also fear that you might find your coworkers to be a little…
juvenile.
I see.
So, what was your son's name again?
Uh, Orion.
Like the constellation. I love that.
[exhales] Yeah. No. Like the greatest hunter in Greek mythology.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 그리스 신화에 나오는 뛰어난 사냥꾼 이름이죠

translation.en: -[exhales] -Are you okay?
[breathing heavily] Yes. I just--
I'm realizing I need to get back to my son now.
Okay. Uh, what's going on?
Are you having a heart attack?
God, I'm 46, not 96.
I'm having a panic attack.
[breathing heavily] Hi, honey.
Hi. I missed you. Are you okay?
translation.ko: 보고 싶었어 괜찮지? 아무 일 없지?

translation.en: [kisses] Are you okay?
I'm fine. Why shouldn't I be?
I just--I had a bad feeling.
-Why? -I don't know. I just--You know.
What are you working on?
Orion. Come on. You're gonna be late for karate.
-Coming. -Hi, Maria.
-Bye. -Have fun, honey.
Okay.
I wish he was that excited about schoolwork.
translation.ko: 학교 수업도 저렇게 좋아하면 좀 좋아?

translation.en: So, how was the interview?
[exhales] First, can I just say thank you
for being the most amazing husband and father.
You're the best.
You're the best.
And I--
I didn't actually, um-- I didn't end up going, so…
Why?
You know, I-- I felt overqualified actually.
translation.ko: 내 스펙이 너무 넘치는 것 같아서

translation.en: That's okay, because I want you to be happy.
I want Orion to get to know
translation.ko: 난 단지 오리온한테 내가 사랑에 빠진

translation.en: the wonderful, independent woman I fell in love with.
translation.ko: 멋지고 독립적인 여성을 보여주고 싶을 뿐이야

translation.en: Okay. Thank you for that.
Did you ever think, though,
what if this wonderful, independent woman
translation.ko: 당신이 사랑에 빠진 이 멋지고 독립적인 여성이

translation.en: you fell in love with didn't want carrot?
translation.ko: 당신이 사랑에 빠진 이 멋지고 독립적인 여성이 당근을 원치 않는단 생각

translation.en: Carrot. Carrot cake? For her birthday.
Oh. Uh, carrot.
I thought-- I thought carrot was your favorite. Am I--Did I get that wrong?
I haven't touched gluten in months, Will.
translation.ko: 나 글루텐 끊은 지 몇 달 됐어

translation.en: Not that you would notice, you know.
I mean, you don't-- you don't ask me anything.
You don't-- You just assume, you know.
translation.ko: 그냥 지레짐작하지 그게 우리 관계의 문제야

translation.en: I mean, that's really--That's what's wrong with this relationship.
Uh, I wish that were the only thing.
What? The only thing that's wrong? Will.
-No. -Sorry. What are you saying?
Um, Yasmin,
you--you come home in a whirlwind of panic,
translation.ko: 당신 완전히 흥분한 상태로 집에 올 때 있잖아

translation.en: and it scares Orion sometimes.
Now you're telling me I scare my own child,
translation.ko: 내가 내 자식을 겁먹게 한다는 거야?

translation.en: which is, like, basically the worst thing you could ever say to me.
translation.ko: 당신이 지금껏 한 말 중에 가장 끔찍하네

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey, all I'm saying is that sometimes it's too hard.
translation.ko: 당신이 지금껏 한 말 중에 가장 끔찍하네 그냥 가끔은 너무 힘들단 거야

translation.en: Too hard to what? Hard to love me?
Oh, my God, Will.
[in French] Repeat after me, Albert. "The house is small."
-Yes? -[Martin] Are you with Albert right now?
Yes, I've just picked him up.
Take me off the speaker, please.
-So, they've celebrated… -Wait, wait.
-Yes? -They've celebrated the New Year
translation.ko: 말해 학교에서 신년 맞이 행사하면서 사탕을 나눠줬다는데

translation.en: in school and they gave them candy. He can't have any at all.
translation.ko: 학교에서 신년 맞이 행사하면서 사탕을 나눠줬다는데 애 못 먹게 해

translation.en: But it's just a few. They're organic.
I don't give a damn about their belated New Year's party.
translation.ko: 다 늦어서 신년 파티는 뭐 하러 한대?

translation.en: Halloween, Valetine's Day, they always have excuses to get them hooked on sugar.
translation.ko: 핼러윈, 밸런타인 애들을 설탕에 중독시킬 핑계를 못 만들어 난리야

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, okay, okay. So… Hello?
[in English] Why is Daddy always so angry at you?
He's not angry at me, sweetie. He's angry at sugar.
translation.ko: 엄마한테 화난 게 아니라 설탕에 화난 거야

translation.en: Why?
Because sugar's very bad for you, sweetie.
I mean, you can end up with diabetes.
What does diabetes do to you?
It can make you very sick and have-- Your toes can fall out.
translation.ko: 몸이 많이 아파지고 발가락을 못 쓰게 될 수도 있어

translation.en: Isn't that leprosy?
-Okay, just give me the candy. -But, Mom--
Albert, just give me the two bags. Diabetes makes your toes fall off, too.
translation.ko: 알베르, 두 봉지만 줘 당뇨로 발가락 썩는 게 싫으면

translation.en: Fine. Fine.
Sir. Hi. Happy New Year.
translation.ko: 안녕하세요 새해 복 많이 받으세요 유기농이에요

translation.en: They're organic.
The world is fucked.
Is the world really fucked, Mom?
No. I mean, it's--I mean, yes, it is.
No, it's not. It's not. Not for us.
Why not for us?
Well, because we're the happy ones, lucky ones that live together as a family
translation.ko: 우린 행복하고 운이 좋아서 가족이 함께 살고

translation.en: and we eat healthy food every day, you know.
The poor homeless, they don't have a kitchen. They can't cook.
translation.ko: 불쌍한 노숙자들은 주방이 없어서 요리도 못 하잖아

translation.en: Well, that's why we're gonna distribute meals at a homeless shelter next month.
translation.ko: 그래서 다음 달에 노숙인 쉼터에서 음식을 나눠주는 거군요

translation.en: The school says that we need to be agents of change in the world.
translation.ko: 학교에서 우리가 세상을 바꾸는 촉매가 돼야 한댔어요

translation.en: Isn't that a bit dangerous for a school trip?
I mean, homeless people are crazy now.
I mean, they're angry, not crazy.
They're angry. I mean, this one was angry and crazy.
translation.ko: 미친 게 아니라 화가 가득하지 아까 그 사람은 화가 났고 제정신도 아니었지만

translation.en: Mom, please make sure you don't say that in front of anyone at my school.
translation.ko: 엄마, 학교 애들 앞에서는 절대로 그런 말 하지 마세요

translation.en: Okay.
Oh. Next week at school, we're gonna practice for the drill,
translation.ko: 학교에서 다음 주에 대피 훈련도 한대요

translation.en: so you know what to do in case there's an earthquake,
fire, a human-made emergency.
translation.ko: 지진이나 화재 인간이 초래한 비상사태를 대비하기 위해서요

translation.en: What's that?
You know. Like… [imitating gunshots]
Okay. Stop, stop, stop. Get--Just eat candy.
Just--Just don't tell your dad.
Just eat the-the-the chocolate ones.
Thank you, Mom.
Mom, do you think if John Lennon had not been shot,
translation.ko: 엄마, 존 레넌이 총에 안 맞았다면

translation.en: the world would be a better place?
Oh, I don't know.
Maybe.
I think it would.
My tags say, "Made in L.A. fair and safe."
translation.ko: 우리 옷 태그에 이렇게 적혀 있어 '공정하고 안전하게 LA에서 생산'

translation.en: Okay, I cannot have children making children's clothes.
translation.ko: 아동 노동력으로 아동복을 만들 순 없다고

translation.en: Should I put, "Made for children by children" on the label?
Catchy. But she's over 20.
Is she?
See?
-She's 28? -Mm-hmm.
Well, I really can't even tell if it's her.
I'm sure it's a bad picture.
It's fine. It's totally fine. Totally fine.
-Okay. -Okay.
Hey, Yas. Can I call you back?
-I think Will might be leaving me. -What?
What am I supposed to do? Rent an apartment?
Oh, no. No one wants a terrorist in their building.
-What? -Everyone knows all Muslims are terrorists.
Oh, honey.
I don't even have any money of my own.
I just--You know what?
I'm just-- I'm gonna go walk to the ocean.
Just be at the beach, be in nature.
I don't know. Something bigger than all of this shit.
I'll come--I'll come-- I'll come meet you, okay? Wait.
I can't live like this anymore.
Yasmin?
I can't live like this anymore.
What do you mean? You have so much to live for.
translation.ko: 무슨 소리야? 얼마나 의미 있는 인생인데

translation.en: It's too late.
Too late? You're 30 years old.
Exactly.
No, but, I mean, I just-- I feel like something really bad is gonna happen.
translation.ko: 하지만 진짜 나쁜 일이 벌어질 것 같단 말이야

translation.en: Like, in the world.
Honey, you're beautiful. You're smart.
translation.ko: 야스민 넌 아름답고 똑똑하고 진짜 이상한 애잖아

translation.en: You're fucked up. You're gonna be fine.
translation.ko: 넌 아름답고 똑똑하고 진짜 이상한 애잖아 아무 일 없을 거야

translation.en: I swear.
translation.ko: - 진짜야, 날 믿어 - 나에 관해 잘 모르면서

translation.en: -You don't even know me. -I know, but I like you already.
translation.ko: - 진짜야, 날 믿어 - 나에 관해 잘 모르면서 - 그런데도 네가 좋네 - 얘들아!

translation.en: Guys. Guys.
-Guys! -What?
I just made out with this guy, and I think that he was toothless.
translation.ko: 방금 어떤 남자랑 키스했는데 이가 없었던 것 같아

translation.en: -[laughing] -What?
He had no teeth.
-I just bit my tongue. -Toothless.
It's so weird. It's true. It's so weird.
I'm trying to save somebody here.
translation.ko: - 나 진지한 얘기 중이야 - 진짜 신기하다

translation.en: -Shh. -What, babe?
Don't jump.
Don't jump.
-What? -Don't jump.
Jump? I'm trying to light my cigarette. I just…
You guys--What?
-Seriously, you guys. -What?
-What? -Seriously, I think something really bad is gonna happen in the world.
translation.ko: 진짜로 이 세상에 뭔가 끔찍한 일이 벌어질 것 같아

translation.en: -But, no, I mean, like, worse than Y2K. -No.
-Wow. -Worse than if George W. Bush wins.
translation.ko: 조지 W. 부시가 대통령 되는 것보다 끔찍한 일

translation.en: -Where are you getting this stuff? -Seriously.
translation.ko: 웬 뚱딴지같은 소리야? - 진짜라니까 - 제정신 아니네

translation.en: She's really cool.
I think we're gonna be best friends. I do.
translation.ko: 우리 베프 될 것 같아 이름이 뭐랬지?

translation.en: -What's your name again? -You don't remember my name?
translation.ko: 우리 베프 될 것 같아 이름이 뭐랬지? 이름도 기억 못 해?

translation.en: -Shaharzan. Shaharzan. -No.
-No? -It's Yasmin.
Come on. Let's get a drink. Come on.
Let's go. Come on.
The 21st century warriors. Let's go!
Yasmin?
-[line clicks, beeps] -Yasmin?
Hi. This is Yasmin. Please leave a message.
Oh, my God.
Oh, my God.
Gretchen, I really need you to watch Sebastian, okay?
Yeah, I already did 35 hours for this week, Anne. You know that.
translation.ko: 이번 주에 벌써 35시간 일한 거 아시잖아요

translation.en: Yasmin needs me.
How about I give you an extra $40 this week, okay?
It's not just about the money, Anne.
It's about my quality of life.
Okay. 45.
I'll give you 75. Okay?
-Yeah. -Okay. Thank you so much.
Appreciate it. Okay. Bye, sweetie.
Bye, Mommy.
[Jerry] I didn't do anything. I was just sitting there.
translation.ko: 난 앉아만 있었어요 아무것도 안 했다고요

translation.en: Yeah, and--and her head fell in your lap and then it slipped in her mouth?
translation.ko: 그럼 엘이 무릎에 쓰러졌는데 그게 저절로 입에 들어갔어요?

translation.en: No. She deliberately gave me… a banana job.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 자기가 원해서 바나나 작업을 해 준 거예요

translation.en: She was crying. She was lonely. She was drunk.
Even better. And then you paid her for it.
What?
I didn't pay her for a banana.
I gave her a check to help her out.
You know, Jerry, this is not a good moment in time for this.
translation.ko: 제리, 요즘은 그런 행동 자제해야 해요

translation.en: People go to jail now.
Justine. This is a struggle for me…
with my situation.
I cried afterwards.
This is--This is a disease, for Christ's sake.
I know, Jerry, but even a friend?
Especially friends. Yes. Even a friend. It's that bad.
translation.ko: 친구한테까지 그랬죠 친구한테 그럴 정도로 심각하다고요

translation.en: But I'm a friend.
Yeah, but you're, you know--
uh, you have a beautiful family, you know.
Okay, can we switch gears for a second? Let's--Let's, uh--
translation.ko: 우리 주제를 좀 바꿉시다 어디 보자

translation.en: Let's talk about the book. How's that coming along?
translation.ko: 책에 관해 얘기해 볼까요? 잘되고 있어요?

translation.en: It's, uh, going great.
So all they're looking for is something French and charming
translation.ko: 출판사에서 원하는 건 매력적인 프랑스 레시피에

translation.en: with a little bit of you thrown in.
And if you want, Evan can take over the kitchen for a few days a week.
translation.ko: 원한다면 며칠씩 에번에게 주방을 맡겨도 돼요

translation.en: Oh, no, he can't do that.
Yes, he can. Just until you finish the first draft.
translation.ko: - 에번 혼자는 못 해요 - 가능해요 초고 완성할 때까지만요

translation.en: No. The restaurant will fall apart without me.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 내가 없으면 가게가 안 돌아가요

translation.en: -No, it won't. -Jerry, you--
-No, it won't. No, it won't. -Jerry…
Are you okay?
Yeah. No.
Because my acid reflux is kicking in.
This conversation made me very nervous.
-About the book? -No, not about the book.
Aren't you supposed to take only two?
My doctor says I'm good for up to 30 a day.
Justine, as my friend, can--can you, uh, just keep your mouth shut about this?
translation.ko: 쥐스틴, 친구로서 부탁인데 이 일은 입 다물어 주면 안 돼요?

translation.en: Yes, I think it's best we all keep our mouths shut around you.
translation.ko: 제리 옆에서는 우리 모두 입 다물고 있는 게 좋겠네요

translation.en: [laughs] That's funny.
Mm-hmm. Very.
[Jerry] Okay.
Whoa, whoa, whoa. The kittens. Don't touch.
-[phone playing tune] -Don't ever do that again. [Justine] Hey, what's going on?
Justine, will you meet me at the beach?
Why?
Yasmin is going there, and she just sounds worse than usual.
translation.ko: 야스민이 거기로 가고 있는데 평소보다 상태가 안 좋은 것 같아

translation.en: You know, like very, very stressed.
-Really? -Oh, shit.
And now her phone's off.
But I'm at work.
Your restaurant is five minutes from the beach. Come on.
Okay, but how am I gonna find her?
She'll probably be around the playground. Just look for her.
Okay, I'll leave Albert at the restaurant and meet you there.
Thank you.
Hello.
-[Anne] Hey, Ell, it's me. -Hi.
-Yasmin is having a crisis. -What do you mean?
translation.ko: 야스민이 또 심각한가 봐 - 뭐? - 휴대폰도 껐어

translation.en: She turned off her phone.
Well, if she turned off her phone, she probably just wants to be alone.
translation.ko: 전화를 꺼놨으면 혼자 있고 싶단 뜻이겠지

translation.en: She's going to the beach. Okay, we need to find her.
translation.ko: - 그러니… - 해변으로 간대 - 찾아야 해 - 뭐?

translation.en: -What? -Justine's already on her way over there.
What do you mean, Justine's on her way over there?
She needs us, Ell. Come on.
Okay, okay.
Sarah, sweetheart, I need you to babysit your brothers.
I have an emergency.
-I don't need a babysitter. -Me neither!
Yes, you do.
You better pay me well.
Really?
-[door closes] -Yeah!
Don't do anything stupid. I have no responsibility over you.
translation.ko: 말썽 피우지 마 난 책임 못 지니까

translation.en: Oh, God. I've been looking everywhere for you.
-I'm sorry, honey. -Why didn't you pick up your phone?
My battery died.
Thanks for coming to find me.
Of course.
Anne, I'm so confused lately.
I just-- I feel like…
I made this decision to be with Will when I was 25,
and now it's colored the entire rest of my life.
translation.ko: 그 결정으로 내 인생의 색깔이 정해졌어

translation.en: I mean, no pun intended. But I live in a completely white world.
translation.ko: 진지하게 하는 말인데 나 완전히 백인 세상에서 살잖아

translation.en: -No offense. -It's okay.
But, you know, I'm Black. I'm Persian.
I'm an out-of-work feminist whose husband pays for her laser hair removal.
translation.ko: 근데 이젠 남편이 레이저 제모까지 돈을 내주는 페미니스트 실업자지

translation.en: Who the fuck am I? You know.
You are a Black, Persian feminist who married a white guy
translation.ko: 넌 흑인, 이란 페미니스트야 자폐 성향이 있을 수도 있는 백인 남편을 둔 여자이자

translation.en: who's possibly on the spectrum, and you are my best friend.
translation.ko: 자폐 성향이 있을 수도 있는 백인 남편을 둔 여자이자 내 단짝 친구지

translation.en: And you're mine.
But I gotta tell you,
translation.ko: 하지만 솔직히 가끔은 전화하는 게 꺼려져

translation.en: sometimes I don't call you, Anne, because you're high all the time.
translation.ko: 하지만 솔직히 가끔은 전화하는 게 꺼려져 늘 약에 취해 있으니까

translation.en: Call me before noon.
Oh, my gosh. You're so…
Wait. Are you high right now? No. [laughs]
-Anne. -The sun is going down.
Oh, my God.
She texted me "south of the police station."
Well, this whole beach is south of the police station.
Oh, man.
I'm kind of excited.
I feel like I'm a superhero on a mission to rescue someone. You know?
translation.ko: 누군가를 구하러 출동한 슈퍼 영웅이 된 기분이야

translation.en: Can you imagine a movie, a superhero movie,
with the protagonist being this middle-aged woman?
She puts on--At night, she puts on, like, a Lycra costume.
Spanx. With Spanx.
And then she goes and rescues another middle-aged woman about to have a breakdown.
translation.ko: 그리고 멘붕에 빠진 중년 여자를 구하러 가는 거야

translation.en: Oh, my God. That could be a hit.
[sighs] I have to go back in 20 minutes at the restaurant.
I mean, if Martin finds out that I left Albert there by himself, I'm…
translation.ko: 20분 후에는 가게에 돌아가야 해 알베르만 가게에 놓고 나온 걸 마르탱이 알면…

translation.en: Why? He loves it there.
All the pretty waitresses flirt with him.
Albert is like a fish in water at the restaurant.
You know what? I spoke to Jerry,
and he told me that the check and the blow job are completely unrelated.
translation.ko: 네가 한 일 때문에 수표 준 게 아니라고 하더라

translation.en: So why did you make this up?
I blew him because I'm lonely,
and he wrote me a check because I'm broke.
translation.ko: 제리는 내가 돈이 없다니까 수표를 줬어

translation.en: So there you have it.
Well, yeah. Keep the "check for the blow job," you know, story.
translation.ko: 해 준 대가로 수표를 받았다는 버전이

translation.en: It's much less depressing.
-Yeah. -Stick to that one.
-My life's depress-- -Oh, it's them.
-Where? -There!
-Yeah. It's them. -What are they doing?
Are they hugging? Are they making out? Ugh!
-I'm so glad you're recovered. -Oh, my God! Hi!
I'm fine. I'm fine.
You know how you have one of those days,
and it just feels like everything is collapsing all around you?
translation.ko: 날 둘러싼 모든 게 무너져 내리는 것 같았다가

translation.en: And then all of a sudden, it's just fine again.
Guys, do you love me?
What?
I mean, friends never ask friends, "Do you love me?"
translation.ko: 친구끼린 그런 거 잘 안 묻지만 나 사랑하냐고

translation.en: Okay, I just dropped my kids.
I left them home alone to come and find you.
translation.ko: 애들만 남겨두고 너 찾으러 쫓아 나왔어 알아

translation.en: -I know. -We would drop everything to come and find you.
translation.ko: 우리 다 모든 걸 제쳐두고 널 찾으러 왔다고

translation.en: I think we might just have to prove it to her, girls.
-No. -Yes.
-No. -One, two, three!
-[Yasmin] Oh, my God! -[kissing]
-Are you okay? -Yeah.
-You'll love me to death. -I thought we were gonna kill you.
translation.ko: 날 죽을 만큼 사랑하나 보네 사랑으로 죽여버리는 거 아니었어? 맙소사

translation.en: Did you like that? No.
[Justine] Look at those birds all lined up.
Every morning I hear them sing.
translation.ko: 매일 아침에 새들 지저귀는 소리가 들리는데

translation.en: And really I believe that they believe that their song is making the sun rise.
translation.ko: 쟤들은 자기 노랫소리를 듣고 해가 떠오른다고 생각하는 것 같아

translation.en: You know? It's like everything and everyone
translation.ko: 뭔지 알겠어? 세상 모두는 자기 존재의 목적을 찾고자 하나 봐

translation.en: needs to find a purpose to their existence.
translation.ko: 세상 모두는 자기 존재의 목적을 찾고자 하나 봐

translation.en: Even if it's complete bullshit.
[laughs] Yeah.
I love that.
Yeah. That's really beautiful.
[Anne] This is one of those perfect moments in life.
[Yasmine] Amazing.
[Ell] Yeah. Look at it.
[Justine] Gorgeous.
[in French] How are you, kiddo?
Did you celebrate New Year's at school?
-[in French] Yes. -Did you eat the candy they gave you?
No.
Mommy didn't… give you any candy? She didn't feed you candy?
Okay.
And how are you? Do you miss your mom? She's been working a lot lately.
translation.ko: 엄마 보고 싶지 않아? 요즘 엄마가 좀 바쁘잖아

translation.en: -No, I'm fine. -You're okay?
What is it? Satie?
[Justine, in English] So if the hole, the nothing, is actually everywhere,
translation.ko: '속이 텅 빈 구멍이 도처에 널려 있다면'

translation.en: how do you manage not to fall into it?
That said, let's go back to our recipe.
Once the roast is cooked, you can start on the mushroom gravy
by adding a touch of soda water and Maizena.
Don't forget to scrape the brown bits vigorously.
translation.ko: '갈색이 도는 전분을 눌어붙지 않게 계속 저어준다'

translation.en: The darker the bits, the more flavor it will give.
